ContentDescription: A mostly dark, near-black image. In the bottom-right corner, a slightly larger fragment of the golden constellation network extends into frame — perhaps 10-15 connected nodes with luminous threads, reaching a bit further toward the center than variant 1 but still confined to the bottom-right quadrant. A few very faint, almost ghostly thread lines trail further into the darkness. The rest is deep midnight void.
